member.name: T:Abp.EntityFramework.AutoRepositoryTypesAttribute
member.summary: Used to define auto-repository types for entities. This can be used for DbContext types.

member.name: T:Abp.EntityFramework.DefaultDbContextAttribute
member.summary: Used to mark a DbContext as default for a multi db context project.

member.name: P:Abp.EntityFramework.EntityTypeInfo.DeclaringType
member.summary: DbContext type that has DbSet property.
